ygData.subject: Re: on switching servers for a guild
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I am aware of several guilds that have existed in other game settings, the Covetous Crew being one of them.  I BELIEVE ( but I am not entirely sure )
ygData.messageBody:
Well,
I am aware of several guilds that have existed in other game settings,
the Covetous Crew being one of them. I BELIEVE ( but I am not entirely sure
) that "The Clan of the Lich" existed on another server before appearing on
Zek.

Go to
www.ralloszek.com
and look up the guilds there. "Lich" is one of them and I recall from
reading their charter that they were or still are on another server.

Enjoy Rallos Zek, it's a blast.

~Xillith


>From: kith@...
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>Subject: [eq_shadowknights] on switching servers for a guild
>Date: 18 Jun 1999 14:00:22 -0000
>
>From: kith@...
>
>Greetings Shadowknights,
>
>I'm fairly sure that once a guild is approved, it can be set on any or
>all servers, but I was wondering how. Must you re-create the same
>character, and then talk to a GM? Or is is more complicated? Recently, I
>started a guild on Tunare with another character, and now I'd like to
>have it on Rallos Zek, because it is probably the greatest server for
>roleplaying, hands down. Any advice is appreciated!
>Thanks,
>
>Envy (tunare)
>Shadow Striders
>
>(aka- Sugan on Tunare and 'Zek)
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Looking to expand your world?
>http://www.onelist.com
>ONElist has 170,000 e-mail communities from which to choose!
